Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1980...
Injured on 5/28/1980 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 8/26/1982 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/14/1985 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Injured on 6/27/1985 with a Ruptured Elbow Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 8/22/1985 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 6/27/1986 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/12/1987...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1987, going 18-12, 4.00 ERA...
Struck out 15 batters against Pittsburgh on 8/2/1989...
Injured on 8/11/1993 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 5/12/1994 with a Fractured Elbow, out for 8 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles to Detroit on 5/19/1995 (Going to LA: 2B T. Walker. Going to DET: P S. Garrelts, P E. Hanson, C J. Kendall)...
Injured on 6/22/1995 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 4-5 weeks...
